issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
I tried to call a jquery.js file in a html file which is also called in a webview ... when testing it on simulator everything works fine, but it wasn't the same result on the device

sample : 
<script src="../scripts/jquery.js" type="text/javascript"></script>

tested with iPhone 4, iOS 6 and Ti SDK 3.0.0 GA

Note : the same code works with SDK 2.1.4 GA. Problem only in iphone when installing on physical device - Ti SDK 3.0.0.GA
fields.summary: iOS: path problem with JS and IMAGE when called it into HTML file

comments.body: Please provide more information. I need an app.js, the HTML file, and the js file used in the sample app. Also provide steps to reproduce, what to expect and what actually happens

We have not heard back from you since you posted the issue. Not sure if this is still showing the similar behavior on physical device. If so, please send us a test case as we requested some time ago so that we can take next necessary step to fix.
Closing since we have not heard from the reporter.
